name: Red. (MuffinMan1)
description:
Red. is a 2D platform video  game which I'm working on. Inspired by the Super Mario world based level system and similiar 2D platform action-adventure  games . It is just a prototype for now so please give it a try and let me know what do you think about it in the comments below. Thanks.

CONTROLS:

Space - jump

A and D or arrows - left and right  movement

Don't forget to rate my game in the comments below.

Enjoy! :)

Huge thanks to the Bayat Games producers for providing all game designers free platform game assets pack in the Unity asset store .

You can get it for free here:

https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/85838   

https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/85838
